title: Water conservation
textContent: Install low-flow fixtures in your workplace to reduce water consumption by up to 30%.

title: Energy efficiency
textContent: Switch to LED lighting to reduce energy consumption by up to 75% compared to incandescent bulbs.

title: Zero Waste
textContent: Implement a composting program to divert up to 40% of your waste stream from landfills.

title: Inclusive Practices
textContent: Create a supplier diversity program to support local and minority-owned businesses in your supply chain.
